author: Staff Reporter
text:
Finance Minister O. Panneerselvam (second from right), taking part in the mass wedding celebration held at Bodi in Theni district on Friday to mark birthday celebrations of Chief Minister Jayalalithaa.— PHOTO: G. Karthikeyan

Sixty eight couples including two Muslim and two Christian couples tied the knot in the mass wedding organised by Finance Minister O. Panneerselvam in Bodi here on Friday.

Mr. Panneerselvam read out the message sent by Chief Minister J. Jayalalithaa during the wedding ceremonyIn Dindigul, Minister for Power R. Viswanathan, party leader E. Madhusudhanan and others organised a mass wedding on Friday morning.

The leaders blessed the couples and praised the leader. They appealed to them to support Ms. Jayalalithaa at all times.

The marriage was performed as per the rituals of various religions.

Two parishes Maria Arpudham and Nelson solemnised the marriage for 10 Christian couples in the hall. Hindu rituals were followed for Hindu couples.
title: Mass wedding organised for 68 couples in Theni and Dindigul districts
